Posts.Content: Jun 4, 2012 01:22PM jamespeterson wrote: I agree with openheart. In moments like this, one needs to try and relax because there is nothing you can do. You just need to wait. They best way to take it off your mind is by doing the things that you most like and being with people you love and care about.
Posts.Title: I know it's all nothing, but... mirabile marie5890
